name: monaco-typescript
description: TypeScript and JavaScript language support for Monaco Editor

scripts.compile: mrmdir ./out && npm run compile-amd && npm run compile-esm && node ./scripts/dts && prettier --write ./monaco.d.ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: mrmdir ./release && npm run compile && node ./scripts/release.js && node ./scripts/bundle && mcopy ./monaco.d.ts ./release/monaco.d.ts && mcopy ./out/esm/monaco.contribution.d.ts ./release/esm/monaco.contribution.d.ts && mcopy ./out/esm/fillers/monaco-editor-core.d.ts ./release/esm/fillers/monaco-editor-core.d.ts

author: Microsoft Corporation
